adv:
The advantages of the tool is that it shows you different vizzes that you other wise wouldn't consider. For exploratory analysis, this tool was useful. I kinda knew what type of graphs it could generate, so I added fields that I had hunches about but wasn't positive to check against.

For the most part, the tool added fields that made sense to include in addition to the original choices.
disadv: Nothing that I could tell in the short time I used it.
comment:
Don't recommend views where a text value would dominate the viz. I had a few recommendations where I couldn't see the graphs because of the texts.

There were some recommendations that created a weird arrow effect with the effect, kinda like >>> that I couldn't understand. I forgot what it included but looked wonky.
